question.title: I can't find io.modelcontextprotocol.sdk
question.body:
I have a task to implement a streaming HTTP MCP server in Spring Boot. I injected the dependencies as follows:

<dependency>
    <groupId>io.modelcontextprotocol.sdk</groupId>
    <artifactId>mcp</artifactId>
    <version>0.13.1</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
    <groupId>io.modelcontextprotocol.sdk</groupId>
    <artifactId>mcp-spring-webmvc</artifactId>
    <version>0.13.1</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.springframework.ai</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-ai-mcp-server-spring-boot-starter</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0-M6</version>
</dependency>

However, when I try to configure the MCP server, my imports look like:

import io.modelcontextprotocol.server.*;

However, I cannot find the McpServer class for configuration.

In the documentation (MCP Server WebMVC), it shows using the McpServer class, but I can't find it in my project.

question_comments.body: With the maven dependencies, finds correctly io.modelcontextprotocol.server.McpServer here. Probably an IDE problem. Try to run mvn install from CLI.
